name: Hydrating BB Cream Tinted Moisturizer, 9Colors Full-Coverage Foundation & Concealer, Brighten Skin Tone & Cover Pores, Oil Control & Cover Flaws, Natural Finish for All Skin Types,160 Light
short_description: 3-in-1 Concealer, Foundation, & Moisturizer BB Cream: When applying, extrude a small amount of the cream onto your fingertips and apply it evenly to your face. This BB cream will provide you with full coverage and conceal imperfections, helping you effortlessly blend and customize your coverage for a smooth, radiant look.

Skin-Nourishing Ingredients: This BB cream is enriched with skincare ingredients likeRosa Rugosa Flower Extract, Pearl Powder and Glycyrrhiza Uralensis (Licorice) Extract. These elements help to moisturize, soothe, and improve the overall condition of your skin, and gives it a hydrated glow, making it suitable for those with sensitive skin as well. It makes the skin look smoother, more radiant, and fresh.

Evens Out Skin Tone for A Natural Look: It is spreadable and has a hydrating, lightweight texture. Softens the appearance of imperfections so that the complexion still looks natural. Leaves you with a bright, soft, flawless complexion.

Concealer: This full-coverage foundation reduces the appearance of acne, redness, dark circles, and large pores, adjusts skin tone, minimizes and blurs pore,s and reduces redness. This BB cream provides natural and buildable coverage, effectively concealing blemishes, redness, and uneven skin tone while still maintaining a lightweight and non-cakey finish.

MULTITASKER & Long-lasting Wear: This BB cream replaces 3 products from your routine: it helps protect skin and improves its appearance as a lightweight moisturizer, it evens out and illuminates skin tone as a corrector, and it helps hold your makeup as a base. It works perfectly as your full-coverage foundation to prep, correct and moisturize skin for 24-hour hydration and glow.

product_description: Discover the secret to flawless, even skin tone—in an instant; L'Oral Paris' Magic Skin Beautifier BB Cream. Over time, more beautiful skin. • 4 Beautifying Actions in 1 • Primes, Corrects, Hydrates, Perfects • Flawless Bare Skin Finish • Ultra Lightweight, with Vitamins C and E Apply a small amount evenly with fingertips and blend onto face. Wash hands immediately after use. For external use only. Avoid contact with eyes. Discontinue use if signs of irritation or rash appear. Keep out of reach of children.

name: Cell Fusion C Skin Blemish Balm No.19 Light - Fair/Light with Neutral Undertone, BB Cream, 24h Coverage with Natural Finish, Tinted Moisutrizer for Face, 1.01 fl.oz.
short_description: Originally made for post-procedure skin, Cell Fusion C Skin Blemish Balm is formulated with soothing ingredients to benefit sensitive skin. It flawlessly covers redness and blemishes, while hydrating and supporting the skin’s barrier. Available in 3 shades suitable for fair to medium skin tones.

[SKINCARE + MAKEUP HYBRID] Rooted in professional clinical care, this BB cream combines makeup benefits with barrier-supporting ingredients. Formulated with 6 peptides and 5 ceramides, it helps strengthen the skin’s barrier and promote healthier-looking skin while Hyaluronic acid delivers long-lasting hydration and a radiant finish.
[REDNESS CARE] Effectively conceals and neutralizes redness while soothing irritation for a healthier, more even-toned complexion.

[24-HOUR COVERAGE] Clinically proven to provide up to 24 hours of coverage for redness and pores. Helps blur redness and pores for a natural, breathable look that lasts all day—without feeling heavy or cakey.
[HOW TO USE] Use alone for flawless coverage, or blend with other shades and textures to customize your formula.

short_description: THE BB CREAM WITH BENEFITS: This fan-favorite, medium, buildable BB Cream is enhanced with active-levels of niacinamide, as well as hyaluronic acid and malachite extract to boost your complexion as it hides imperfections.

MEDIUM BUILDABLE COVERAGE: Perfect Complexion BB Cream has medium, buildable coverage and a natural, hydrating natural semi-matte finish that is ideal to be used on all skin types from dry skin to oily skin.

HELPS STRENGTHEN SKIN BARRIER: Perfect Complexion BB Cream can be used to instantly blur imperfections and even skin tone while good-for-you ingredients like niacinamide and hyaluronic acid improve and hydrate the skin barrier over time, and Malachite extract to protect skin from pollution and free radicals.

CRUELTY FREE FAVORITES FROM JOAH: Our cruelty-free Korean makeup and skincare products are created to outperform even the best prestige products. Shop our best liquid and gel eyeliners, lipsticks, foundations, concealers, skin treatments, and more. Our products are crafted with skin-friendly ingredients like biotin, vitamin E, hyaluronic acid, and peptides.
